1370: Firiin moved to Goetscalcstraet.A.0 after marriage.
Got married to Godeweris at age 32 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Godeweris, Eingeliadis, at age 32.
1371: Had a son with Godeweris, Gheeneman, at age 33.
1372: Had a daughter with Godeweris, Sywi, at age 34.
1373: Had a son with Godeweris, Batten, at age 35.
1374: Lost daughter Sywi when Sywi was 3 years old.
1383: Lost son Lammekin when Lammekin was 0 years old.
